p: The additives affected the relative abundance of Bacteroidetes, Proteobacteria, and Firmicutes ( P = 0.003, 0.014, and 0.014, respectively) as compared to CTR. Bacteroidetes and Firmicutes abundances decreased, whereas the Proteobacteria abundance increased for all treatments compared to CTR. No effect related to the additive was observed for the Euryarchaeota abundance ( P = 0.189). The Euryarchaeota relative abundance was positively associated with CH 4 (% in total GP at 48 h) as follows:
